attributes.action: Theresa May Must Resign and Call a General Election.
attributes.background: Theresa May's government has conducted Airstrikes in Syria without the Strict Approval of Parliament. This is in contempt of Parliament and convention. Theresa May Must resign and a General Election Must be called.

rejection.details:
The resignation of an MP or Minister would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole. 

If you'd like there to be an election within the next 3 months, you may wish to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/204379
